basics.name: Roy Gitonga
basics.label: ICT Director & Project Manager
basics.summary: Experienced ICT professional with a proven track record in project management and software development. Skilled in leading cross-functional teams and delivering innovative solutions across various sectors, including banking, telecommunications, and healthcare.

work.name: Zawingu Limited
work.description: Leading ICT solutions provider specializing in software development and project management.
work.summary: Overseeing the design, development, and deployment of enterprise systems. Leading a cross-functional team to ensure client satisfaction and project success.
highlights: Implemented customized software solutions for diverse clients.
Spearheaded strategic initiatives to enhance service delivery.
Managed a team of 10+ ICT professionals.

work.name: Tetra Tech
work.description: International consulting firm focusing on engineering and technology.
work.summary: Designed data frameworks and methodologies for the Regional Food Balance Sheet System.
highlights: Coordinated with international teams and presented frameworks to senior officials.
Delivered capacity-building sessions for data contributors.

work.description: Consulting firm specializing in economic and social development.
work.summary: Led ICT initiatives and developed strategies for various projects.
highlights: Managed the Mombasa Port Community Charter project.
Developed ICT strategies for multiple clients.

work.name: East African Community
work.summary: Managed projects under EAC and USAID frameworks.
highlights: Operationalized the Regional Food Balance Sheet.
Conducted training sessions for private sector coordinators.

work.name: USAID COMPETE/TRADE HUB
work.description: USAID initiative promoting trade in East Africa.
work.summary: Designed and developed key trade-related tools and systems.
highlights: Developed the East African Community Trade Helpdesk.
Created the East African Community Regional Food Balance Sheet.

highlights: Oversaw the design and maintenance of Equity Bankâ€™s websites.

volunteer.summary: Led and facilitated youth camp activities, focusing on character building, leadership development, and outdoor activities.
highlights: Organized and conducted various youth programs.
Mentored young campers in personal development and teamwork.

activities: Vice Chair of NUCOMSA (Nairobi University Computer Science Students Association)
Founding Editor of Wizards, the University of Nairobi Computer Science Students' Magazine

awards.title: Best Manager 2006
awards.summary: Recognized for outstanding leadership and contribution to Team Leadership.

projects.name: Mombasa Port Charter - ICT Roadmap
projects.summary: Developing a design roadmap for a platform to enhance connectivity and efficiency in African ports.
highlights: Projected to improve operational efficiency by 30%.
Collaborated with multiple stakeholders across the region.
projects.description: The ICT integrations aim to streamline processes and reduce bottlenecks in port operations.
projects.entity: Africa Economic and Social Development Consultants

projects.name: Regional Food Balance Sheet System
projects.summary: Designed and developed a comprehensive framework for food security monitoring.
highlights: Integrated data from multiple sources for analysis.
Presented findings to COMESA officials.
projects.description: This project focused on enhancing food security data management across East Africa.

projects.name: GAIN HEALTH / THE GRASS COMPANY
projects.summary: Implemented an E-Learning system for SME Training Toolkit.

Streamlined training modules for better user experience.

projects.summary: Led the development of a user-friendly research method portal.

projects.name: ACTESA/COMESA Regional Food Balance Sheet
projects.summary: Designed and developed a comprehensive working system.
highlights: Facilitated food security monitoring across the region.
